name: 李春穎　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: 先修課程：3001011 或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
schedule:
1-2 週：Kinematics of a particle
3-4 週：Kinetics of a particle: Force and acceleration
5-6 週：Kinetics of a particle: Work and energy
7 週：Mid-term #1
8-9 週：Kinetics of a particle: Impulse and momentum
10-11 週：Planar kinematics of a rigid body
12-13 週：Planar kinetics of a rigid body: Force and acceleration
14 週：Mid-term #2
15-16 週：Planar kinetics of a rigid body: Work and energy
17-18 週：Planar kinetics of a rigid body: Impulse and momentum
Final Exam
scorePolicy:
出席及平時表現：10％
期中考＃1：30％
期中考＃2：30％
期末考：30％
materials:
1. Vector Mechanics for Engineers- Dynamics, by Beer, Johnston, et al., 11th edition, McGraw-Hill Pub. Co., 2016
2. Engineering Mechanicas- Dynamics, by Hibbeler, 14/e, 2017, Pearson
remarks:
電子郵件： leech@mail.ntut.edu.tw
